mysteries.name: The Annunciation
mysteries.description: The Angel Gabriel announces to Mary that she will conceive Jesus.

mysteries.name: The Visitation
mysteries.description: Mary visits Elizabeth, who proclaims her blessed among women.

mysteries.name: The Nativity
mysteries.description: Jesus is born in Bethlehem, laid in a manger.

mysteries.name: The Presentation in the Temple
mysteries.description: Mary and Joseph present Jesus in the Temple, fulfilling the law.

mysteries.name: The Finding in the Temple
mysteries.description: Mary and Joseph find Jesus teaching in the Temple at age twelve.
